channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Justice Department Sues Visa, Alleges Illegal Monopoly in Debit-Card Payments
item.description: The U.S.’s largest card network blocked rivals through payments and higher fees levied on merchants, the government says.

item.title: Elon Musk says humans could soon be heading to Mars. This former astronaut begs to differ.
item.description: “I wish he was right, but the reality is that Mars travel, for people, is very risky right now and all the risks are not controlled enough (yet) to al...

item.title: Peak Oil Demand Isn't on the Horizon, OPEC Says
item.description: The cartel said oil demand is forecast to reach 120.1 million barrels a day in 2050 from 102.2 million barrels a day last year.

item.title: Costco made these subtle changes, adding enough ‘friction’ to prompt a downgrade
item.description: Shares of Costco Wholesale Corp. pulled back Tuesday, after Truist analyst Scot Ciccarelli recommended investors stop buying due to concerns that hist...

item.title: Kazatomprom Shares Soar as Uranium Excitement Spreads to Asia
item.description: Shares in Kazatomprom have surged this week after a trio of events increased investor focus on uranium, underlining improved market sentiment regardin...

item.title: 5-year Treasurys tend to beat cash after first Fed rate cut, this chart shows
item.description: For investors considering moving out of cash now that the Federal Reserve has started cutting interest rates, returns from the U.S. Treasury bond mark...

item.title: Regional Airlines Are Doing Terribly. They Need a Recession.
item.description: Despite some green shoots, most regional contractors will probably keep struggling until mainline airlines have an incentive to use smaller planes aga...

item.title: ‘I’m struggling with grief and loss’: I inherited seven figures after my parents died young. Why do I feel guilty?
item.description: “It’s odd that, in life, loss and money can be so tied up — that death can be a financial boon for bereaved people.”

item.title: Don't Count on a Megadeal to Save Intel
item.description: Qualcomm or any other buyer would get a design business that has lost market share and a fab business bleeding money

item.title: Trump tariffs on Chinese goods could cost Americans, but Biden still needs to do more
item.description: A 60% tariff on Chinese imports could end up hurting the U.S. more than China.
